    • Class Chat.ClientFrame extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • SERVER_PORT

          int SERVER_PORT
          Which port the server listening to. Make sure same port if specified in the ServerFrame file

        • socket

          java.net.Socket socket
          Socket object for the current client

        • out

          java.io.PrintWriter out
          Socket output to server - for sending data through the socket to the server

        • in

          java.io.BufferedReader in
          Socket input from server - for reading server's data

        • info

          ClientInfoSeirialized info
          All the info the client send to the server will be here
